entries.light_power_core_unit: This power core unit is intended for smaller structures.
entries.small_storage_unit: This unit is perfect for storing small amounts of materials.
entries.fluidic_drilling_pump_unit: This unit provides cooling and hydraulic support to drilling machinery.
entries.load_bearing_structure_and_shell4: A very advanced load-bearing structure and shell.
entries.load_bearing_structure_and_shell3: An advanced load-bearing structure and shell.
entries.load_bearing_structure_and_shell: A basic load-bearing structure and shell.
entries.gas_storage_unit: A storage unit designed to hold volatile and non-volatile gases.
entries.gas_storage_tank: A storage tank designed to hold volatile and non-volatile gases.
entries.bio_storage_unit: A storage unit designed for biological material.
entries.bio_storage_tank: A storage tank designed to hold biological material.
entries.load_bearing_structure_and_shell2: A slightly advanced load-bearing structure and shell.
entries.ore_storage_tank: A storage tank designed to hold ore.
entries.liquid_storage_unit: A storage unit designed for liquids.
entries.gaskets_and_storage_tank_lining: This is lining for gaskets and the storage tank.
entries.body_shell_and_casing: A body shell and its casing.
